citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 15:30-15:45
on 07-Sep-17.
Contacted facility by phone, responsible party would not be returning for several hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

on 07-Sep-17.
Contacted facility by phone, responsible party would not be returning for several hours.
